Course

Saliency in the Arcade

Where does and agent ‘look’, does it base its decision on the same information as humans?

As a collabiration project between KU and Lego. We have the oportunity to combine machine learning together with lego. We have not decided yet what exacty will be the goal of the project, but it will most likely be amazing.

This project was done in collabaration with @vhrgitai and @faaip, for the repo see github.

Kaggle Competition, Furniture classification

For this project we participated in a kaggle competition, where the goal is to classify a furniture dataset.

Hackaton

TrAivel, happiness is a destination

During a hackaton we made a travel recommendation system that takes into account the happiness of the destination.

Thesis

Geodesic Convolution

In this post shows an idea to generalise convolutional layers from images (functions on $\mathbb{R}^2$) to functions on triangulated manifolds. It will focus on the convolution of a kernel with a function. In a future post we will address the problem of input channels and output channels. The ideas presented here are based on this paper.

Heat Method

The heat method, used to calculate geodesic distance on a triangulated mesh

Geodesics on Manifolds

The discription to approximate the geodesic, using a linear approxiamtion and a quadratic approximation.

Fast Marching Method

This post is devoted to the Fast Marching Method.

Discrete Laplace Beltrami

This post show the implementation of the discrete laplace operator. See the github repo for the jupyter notebook.
